intro: Psychotria phanerophlebia, commonly known as the showy psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that are typically bright red or orange in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. The leaves are usually elliptical with a smooth texture and can vary in size depending on the growing conditions.
